title: When I Was Becca Green
description: When I Was Becca GreenEaston and Beck are back in the final installment of The Tethered Soul Series.Beck looks back on her life and remembers the twists and turns she took in stride—how she grew and inspired those around her to do the same.She learns that everything has a cost and love doesn’t come cheap. But Beck is no stranger to risk, and she gambles immortality for a chance to stay in Nora’s life . . . even if that means revealing her secret to a long-lost friend, who’s certain to think her a ghost. But all good things must come to an end, and a Tethered Soul is no exception. Who will remain? And who will move on? And where will this leave the remarkable tale of love that refuses to ever unravel?Answers lie beyond . . .
author: Laura C. Reden
